# Code of Conduct

## Our Pledge

Simplistic Tetris is committed to providing a welcoming and friendly environment for everyone participating in this project.

## Expected Behavior

* Be respectful and kind to others
* Provide constructive feedback
* Help others learn and improve
* Focus on what is best for the project

## Unacceptable Behavior

* Harassment, trolling, or personal attacks
* Offensive or inappropriate language
* Spam or off-topic discussions
* Any behavior that makes others feel unwelcome

## Reporting

If you experience or witness unacceptable behavior, please report it by opening an [issue](https://github.com/KevOneRedOne/Simplistic-Tetris/issues/new/choose). All reports will be reviewed and handled appropriately.

## Attribution

This Code of Conduct is adapted from the [Contributor Covenant](https://www.contributor-covenant.org), version 3.0.
